short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Paste Lorem Ipsum placeholder Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling exhausted from repeatedly copying and pasting placeholder text like lorem ipsum? This plugin aids you in swiftly inserting placeholder text with just a single mouse click. You can even add your own custom text effortlessly.
This plugin will assist you in swiftly placing placeholders by simply right-clicking, then selecting from the context menu options of 1x paragraph, 2x paragraphs, or your own custom text of choice.
